thread.title: Raheem Sterling should still be a Liverpool player, says his agent Aidy Ward - This is The West Country

author: Source: This is The West Country
title: Raheem Sterling should still be a Liverpool player, says his agent Aidy Ward - This is The West Country
text:
The winger left Anfield in the summer to join Manchester City and the smooth transition he has made belies the acrimonious nature of his departure from the club he joined as a 15-year-old. Aidy Ward, Sterling's agent, has pinned the blame for the breakdown of their relationship with Liverpool at the door of former boss Brendan Rodgers.
 This is The West Country.
